body:
Dear All,

I have a lazy question, what is the latest version of CIE sky used in
gensky at the moment? their latest update was in 2002 (CIE GENERAL SKY
STANDARD DEFINING LUMINANCE DISTRIBUTIONS) if I am correct.

Cheers,
Ehsan
